problem_definition.command_line:
../../../bin/multiphase_prototype BL_1d_Compressible_A.mpml
mkdir BL_1d_Compressible_A_output
mv *.d.* BL_1d_Compressible_A_output
cp BL_1d_Compressible_A.mpml BL_1d_Compressible_B.mpml sed -i 's/_A/_B/' BL_1d_Compressible_B.mpml
../../../bin/multiphase_prototype BL_1d_Compressible_B.mpml
mkdir BL_1d_Compressible_B_output
mv *.d.* BL_1d_Compressible_B_output
rm -f BL_1d_Compressible_B.mpml

variables.variable: from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat reference_error_max_A = stat("BL_1d_Compressible_A.stat")["phase1"]["ReferenceError"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat reference_error_l2norm_A = stat("BL_1d_Compressible_A.stat")["phase1"]["ReferenceError"]["l2norm"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat reference_error_max_B = stat("BL_1d_Compressible_B.stat")["phase1"]["ReferenceError"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat reference_error_l2norm_B = stat("BL_1d_Compressible_B.stat")["phase1"]["ReferenceError"]["l2norm"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat regression_difference_max_A = stat("BL_1d_Compressible_A.stat")["phase1"]["RegressionDifference"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat regression_difference_max_B = stat("BL_1d_Compressible_B.stat")["phase1"]["RegressionDifference"]["max"][-1]

test.name: Assert max absolute reference_error for mesh A is less than 3.0e-01
Assert l2norm absolute reference_error for mesh A is less than 7.0e-01
Assert max absolute reference_error for mesh B is less than 4.0e-01
Assert l2norm absolute reference_error for mesh B is less than 8.0e-01
Assert max absolute regression difference for mesh A is less than 1.0e-10
Assert max absolute regression difference for mesh B is less than 1.0e-10
